text: A burrito is a traditional Mexican dish. It is based on a tortilla filled with foods such as meat, beans or cheese. They use foods such as Mexican rice, beans, lettuce, salsa (such as pico de gallo), meat (such as carne asada), avocado, cheese, and sour cream. Burritos are popular in the United States along with tacos and tostadas. == Related pages == * Lahmacun * Tex-Mex Category:Mexican food
title: Burrito
